section.title: Technology dependencies
section.para: C WS Core depends on the following GT components:

listitem.simpara: Globus XIO (used by C WS core for efficient HTTP and TCP transport)

section.para: C WS Core depends on the following 3rd party software:

listitem.simpara: Libxml2 (used by C WS Core for SOAP XML parsing and WSDL parsing)
OpenSSL (used by C WS Core for Security)
JavaScript (used by C WS Core as a template language to generate the C bindings from WSDL schemas)
